CustomField.description: Determines what happens when session timeout occurs.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Select 'logout' for standard logout or 'redirect' to direct users to a specific URL.
Important: If 'redirect' is selected, you must provide a valid URL in the 'Redirect URL' field. Otherwise, the session timeout pop-up may not function as expected.
CustomField.label: Post-Timeout Action
